name: Tiny Races
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a professional driver ? Run in rally, in single-seat races. Or run amazing races in city by night.

Have a look at the demo of our first game and try to win the 2 offered races !! Download it for free here : https://darkxavius.games/en/alpha-trial-version/

You liked this overview ? Come and help us to finish the full game : https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/darkxavius-games/tiny-races
